name: marathon-slack
description: Sends events from the Marathon event bus to a Slack WebHook, and get automatically notified about what is happening in your Marathon instance (e.g. deployments, failed heath checks etc.).
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. This will install marathon-slack... Send your Marathon events to Slack!
postInstallNotes: Thanks for installing! Have fun sending your Marathon events to Slack.
